title: How to Make Mushroom Stroganoff

steps.headline: Melt the butter in a pan on a medium heat.
Add the onions.
steps.description: Mix well in the butter and then leave them on a relatively low heat to soften, stirring often. Add the garlic and stir well.

steps.headline: Add the mushrooms.
steps.description: Mix well and leave to simmer for about five minutes until soft.

parts.name: Adding the Rest of the Ingredients

steps.headline: Add the tomato puree, paprika, French mustard and chicken stock to the pan.
Mix well and leave to simmer for another five minutes.
Take the pan off the heat.
steps.description: Stir in the sour cream, lemon juice, and parsley. Place the pan back on the heat and mix in the brandy.

steps.headline: Serve with wild rice and some extra parsley and lemon juice on top.

text: Cooking the Mushrooms Melt the butter in a pan on a medium heat.  Add the onions. Mix well in the butter and then leave them on a relatively low heat to soften, stirring often. Add the garlic and stir well. Add the mushrooms. Mix well and leave to simmer for about five minutes until soft. Adding the Rest of the Ingredients Add the tomato puree, paprika, French mustard and chicken stock to the pan.  Mix well and leave to simmer for another five minutes.  Take the pan off the heat. Stir in the sour cream, lemon juice, and parsley. Place the pan back on the heat and mix in the brandy. Serve with wild rice and some extra parsley and lemon juice on top.  Finished.
